text: "Always Was" is a song recorded by American country music artist Aaron Tippin. It was released in August 2001 as the third single from the album People Like Us. The song reached #40 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Tony Colton and Bobby Wood. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2001) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2001 singles Category:2000 songs Category:Aaron Tippin songs Category:Lyric Street Records singles Category:Songs written by Tony Colton
title: Always Was
